Услуги по регистрации
компанийСчетаЛицензии

Acalista provides legal support and assistance to foreign enterprises and companies. We work closely with clients from the following industries: IT, FinTech, investments, blockchain, gambling.
Acalista's team of experienced lawyers will provide legal services in any jurisdiction and help your company conduct business in accordance with local laws.

Personal information:
compliance with the GDPR and
international regulations

Personal information and data are an indispensable part of any modern business. For companies working via the Internet as well as for European clients or partners, it is especially important to ensure the correct handling of personal data, as such activities are strictly regulated by the GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation). If you work in IT, be sure to handle the issue of compliance with the GDPR.

Acalista specialists will gladly help you configure the processes of working with personal data and bring them into conformity with the GDPR and laws concerning the protection of personal information.

IT

Selecting the right country to register an IT-company in is one of the crucial moments for launching and operating a business effectively.

When making this difficult choice, a thorough preparatory research should be conducted, taking into account a large number of factors, the overall goals of the business, its scale and geography, acceptable tax burden, the possibility of creating and the cost of maintaining a bank account, the conditions for opening and using a bank account. Of course, these are just a few of the factors that need to considered.

The cost of a mistake when choosing a country to register an IT-company in may lead to the closure of the project. If you decide to launch your IT-project, it is better not to engage in amateur activities to the detriment of your business and immediately contact the specialists instead.

Acalista will select the best solution for you according to your particular goals.

Gambling

Betting licensesCasino licensesPoker licenses

When selecting a jurisdiction to place an online betting, bingo, casino, eSports, sports betting, or lottery business, it is important to consider the initial licensing costs and maintenance costs as well as the tax burden and the benefits of each jurisdiction.

All legal online gaming companies must be registered and meet the requirements in at least one jurisdiction. The most common jurisdictions for obtaining the appropriate license are Curaçao, Costa Rica, Malta, and the United Kingdom.

Many prefer traditional options such as the UK or Malta, but applying for a license in these jurisdictions is expensive, complicated, and time-consuming. For those planning to launch a startup with a new product, it can be quite a risky process. That is why at Acalista, we recommend that you test your concept and product before making the final decision.

Among the few countries where a gaming license can be obtained, the most popular option is Curaçao. There are a number of reasons for that: the license does not require a personal visit, only a minimum time period is required, the procedure is extremely simple, and, finally, the budget is most comfortable.

Moreover, global suppliers of games willingly collaborate with a company if it has a Curaçao license. In addition, the country has some of the most favorable tax benefits, no sales tax, no import duties, no VAT, and no restrictions on dividend withdrawal.

FinTech

Complex solutions for FinTech projects Our range of services for FinTech projects:E-money Institutions/Small E-money:Offshore banking license, turnkey bank Types of offshore banking licenses:Legal cryptocurrency services

FinTech projects are projects that use innovation and technology to compete with traditional financial institutions represented by banks and intermediaries in the financial services market.

We offer our clients our experience and assistance in obtaining financial and payment licenses such as: Payment Institution /Small PI licenses, E-money Institution/Small E-money Institution licenses, SVF and MSO licenses, banking licenses in Europe, and offshore banking licenses.

Acalista is a comprehensive service for turnkey projects. From selecting a jurisdiction for registering the company, monthly legal support, and developing software for banks and payment systems to launching a full-fledged project.

  • Determination of business model for the project, selection of optimal jurisdiction, calculation of tax burden
  • Company registration, opening current accounts
  • Development of internal regulations and company documents
  • Preparation of all documents for issuing a Payment Institution/ E-money Institution license
  • Selection of local office and recruitment of qualified employees: AML, KYC officers, CEO
  • Maintaining accounting, filing financial statements
  • Establishing partner correspondent relations with banks and external payment service providers

EMI (Electronic Money Institution) is a payment institution that has the right to issue its own electronic money, distribute it in a virtual network, and exchange it for clients' fiat money. In order to register a company and obtain an EMI license, you must take into account the peculiarities of the project and the nature of the services offered as well as choose a jurisdiction that will help you quickly and efficiently achieve the desired result.

You can get a banking license in any country in the world, but there are countries where the procedure is easier and cheaper. Offshore banks are attractive for preferential taxation, as they either do not pay taxes at all or pay them at a much lower rate than resident banks.

International bank license is the most common type of offshore license, allowing you to do business only with clients outside the country where your bank is located.

General bank license allows you to conduct business with clients both inside and outside the country where the bank is located. Capital requirements to open this type of bank are much higher, and banks with a general banking license face much greater regulation.

Limited bank license: banks with this type of license are usually used only to serve a group of wealthy people or for multinational corporations, to manage their international obligations. The peculiarity of banks with a limited license is that they can only enter into contracts with a certain number of persons, which are specified in the license.

We offer a wide range of countries where you can obtain an offshore banking license: Saint Lucia, the Cayman Islands, Bahamas, Panama, and others. In addition, we operate across Europe, obtaining banking licenses in the Eurozone.

  • complete support of a turnkey project
  • selecting the optimal jurisdiction and company registration
  • developing a corporate structure tailored to your project
  • preparation of key and specific documentation for your project individually
  • obtaining licenses for storage and exchange of cryptocurrencies, obtaining special permits
  • development of mechanisms for receipt, turnover, and conversion of fiat and cryptocurrency products
  • opening accounts with banks and payment systems
  • consultaions on tax planning

licenses are available

Some of the possiblejurisdictions:

Great Britan
We specialize in the sale of commercial, investment, and residential real estate throughout the UK, as well as in its further maintenance.
We help you increase your profits by obtaining mortgage loans from UK banks, diversifying investment portfolios, and selecting the most liquid real estate.
USA
To date, we have provided our customers with hundreds of houses.
We provide our clients with mortgage loans in U.S. banks.
In the U.S., there is a special bank product — a mortgage loan for foreigners, with conditions varying from one organization to another. Typically, the minimum loan amount is $100000, the minimum down payment starts from 30% (depending on the kind of real estate), and the interest rate starts from 5% per annum (depending on the loan period and down payment). The loan period is up to 30 years.
Canada
Portugal
Acquisition of real estate in Portugal may be an excellent option for the following reasons:
Low prices. Local property is more profitable than in many European countries.
Quality of life. Lisbon is on the lists of the best European capitals in terms of residence and immigration.
Trust towards foreigners. The Portuguese attitude towards foreigners is highly friendly, with a liberal law on immigration in force.
Ability to obtain a loan. The Portuguese authorities provide foreigners with mortgages with a minimal package of required documents.
Spain
Germany
Buying real estate in Germany offers a number of advantages:
Stable income in a reliable currency — euros. This is a highly valuable investment, suitable for those who reside in Russia and wish to create a stable "airbag" in euros.
Foreign owners of German property are granted a Schengen visa with the right to stay in the EU. Within this period, you can travel around Europe or live in your home, with no restrictions in case of immigration.
The possibility of obtaining funding from German banks to buy further real estate objects at low interest rates.
The prospect of obtaining a residence permit depends on the amount of investment and applies more to commercial real estate in Germany, business immigration a popular option in the country.
Israel
Wealthy foreigners prefer to invest in real estate in iconic, symbolic places, for example, near the walls of the Old City of Jerusalem or along the coast of Tel Aviv. Additionally, there is a general sizeable interest in housing located on the outskirts of the cities.
In particular, investors who want to buy houses by the sea often consider not the expensive city of Tel Aviv, but other cities on the Mediterranean coast, such as Netanya or Ashdod, where prices are relatively lower.
Lower interest rates have contributed to increased demand among investors, private buyers, young couples, and generally everyone who wants to move into better homes, so further increase in demand and, consequently, higher prices are to be expected.
Cyprus
Among potential investors who want to obtain a second citizenship or a residence permit through the purchase of real estate, Cyprus is now at the top. Why? Because Cyprus is part of the European Union. If we take, say, Turkey or Montenegro, when buying real estate there, you almost immediately get a residence permit for a year, for your whole family. In Cyprus, the same conditions apply when buying any property costing 300 thousand euros or more. But this is a residence permit in a country of the European Union, and with it, you can travel around Europe without visas. There are great opportunities present. And if you receive permanent residence in Cyprus, even more opportunities are waiting for you. And if you have a lifetime permanent residence, you will only need to visit Cyprus once within two years. That is, the island doesn't create any conditions for you.
Thailand
Thailand's real estate market is one of the busiest in the whole of Southeast Asia, with experts predicting the highest growth in the luxury sector. This is the freest and most demanded niche, so new curious real estate objects are expected to appear and profitability to increase.
Montenegro
Montenegro is a very "compact" country with such beautiful cities as Budva, Bar, and Kotor. It's convenient to live here, and it's in the center of Europe. Real estate prices in Montenegro start from 1600 euros per square meter. An apartment of about 50-60 square meters can cost from 75 thousand euros. Naturally, we're not talking about chic complexes like in Thailand or Turkey, but this apartment will be located 800 meters from the coast, and the night life of Budva will be right there for you, within walking distance!
Czech Republic
The Czech Republic is an exceptionally convenient and comfortable place for any form of long-term stay, whether it is permanent residence, recreation, business, or study. The Czech Republic is a typical European country with a mild climate and diverse nature, a stable political, economic, and legal system, world-famous resorts, abundant opportunities for summer and winter holidays, the best beer in the world, and a rich history. The Czech Republic is a technologically advanced country and has one of the highest economic growth rates in Europe. The Czech Republic is conveniently located in the center of Europe, 2-4 hours by car away from its capital, Prague, to Vienna, Berlin, or Munich.

Commercial
real estate

Commercial real estate objects are premises, buildings, structures, and sites that are intended for generating a profit by renting out or conducting business activities directly by the owner. Either a legal entity or an individual can own a commercial real estate object. Profitability of commercial real estate is the main criterion of its evaluation.

  • Commercial real estate for retail trade.

    Shopping and entertainment centers, stores, pharmacies, car dealerships. That is, everything that is associated with retail sale.

  • Industrial commercial real estate.

    Production areas of plants and enterprises as well as warehouses belong to this group.

  • Commercial office real estate.

    Commercial office real estate. The most demanded kind of real estate at the moment: the market is evolving and new companies are appearing, for which a personal office is a necessity, with renting office space a common form of relations. The huge demand for this type of real estate affects its price.

How one can use commercial real estate?

Commercial real estate is used to make a profit. To this end, real estate can be:

Organized for your
own enterprise
By enterprise, not only production of goods is meant but also any other kind of business. This option is suitable for owners who have a well-thought-out business plan and a desire to conduct extensive business activities. Your own premises help you save funds and channel them to business development.
Rented out
If you own a commercial space, you can rent it out to other entrepreneurs and receive passive income. After paying taxes on renting out your real estate, you will obtain net profit without any additional capital or labor investments. You can compensate for the wear and tear of the premises at the expense of the lessee by specifying this condition in the agreement.
Resold
If you buy a real estate object in bad condition, for example, without repair, you may improve it and resell it at a more favorable price.

In some cases, it is inadvisable to manage commercial type objects on your own, for example, if the owner doesn't have the necessary skills, information, or time. To increase the profitability of your investment, you can sign a contract with a company that provides commercial real estate brokerage services. In the course of the transaction, the owner transfers the property to third parties who will do their best to increase the profitability of the real estate object.

Fiduciary management

When buying real estate in another country, you will face a number of new tasks related to the maintenance or service of the purchased apartment or house after the purchase.
The ACALISTA company offers its clients the function of fiduciary management of purchased real estate.

  • We will not just be an intermediary in search of lessees — we will represent your interests in all legal, financial, and economic matters to ensure that your property is in perfect technical condition and brings profit.
  • We will enter into contracts on your behalf with utility companies (electricity, gas, water and sewage, heating).
  • When selecting lessees most carefully since it is essential that the lessee not only pays all bills and rent on time, but also does not spoil or damage the property.
  • We help the owner of the apartment choose the most convenient and optimal way for to pay the rent. We constantly monitor the lessee on a long-term basis.
  • If there are any defects or technical malfunctions, we will solve these issues.
  • If necessary, we will register you as a taxpayer when renting the property, prepare a tax return, and help you to pay this tax correctly.
  • We will solve any legal issues and disputes, if any.
  • We will insure your property in case of unforeseen or force majeure damage.
